review_data.title: Don't miss the starters
review_data.content: Don't miss the starters: the garlic prawns, squid with parsley and garlic, but especially, the padron peppers are unforgettable. As main course, the grilled veal cutlet is my favorite. Pricy bur worth every penny. Always stop by when passing through Zürich.

review_data.title: Nice Spanish in Switzerland

review_data.title: Great service and even better food
